title: Woodcut type archive
content:
Does anyone know if there is a large online library of scanned woodcut typefaces to download as high res TIFFs?

Thanks!  
Patrick
author: PatrickFry

comments.content:
Don't know about complete fonts, but Dover Publications publishes books of copyright-free decorative letters. Some may be from woodcuts. Your public library may have copies, also available in bookstores and online.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters2_5984.jpg)

Large scans of full specimens are hard to come by, but some of these may be useful...

A great resource, but not necessarily for high-res scans:  
 [http://www.utexas.edu/cofa/rrk/specimens.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/www.utexas.edu/cofa/rrk/specimens.php "http://www.utexas.edu/cofa/rrk/specimens.php")

Hamilton Wood Type catalog, fairly high quality images:  
 [http://www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum/hamilton14/hamiltonf...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum/hamilton14/hamiltonfourteen.asp "http://www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum/hamilton14/hamiltonfourteen.asp")

Links to online type specimens compiled by Ralf Herrmann, who posts on this forum (thanks, Ralf, for gathering these resources):  
 [http://opentype.info/blog/2008/02/18/type-specimen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/opentype.info/blog/2008/02/18/type-specimen/ "http://opentype.info/blog/2008/02/18/type-specimen/")

Random type specimens here:  
 [http://dailytypespecimen.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/dailytypespecimen.com/ "http://dailytypespecimen.com/")

Various specimens  
 [http://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008592297](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008592297 "http://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008592297")

Some high resolution woodtype scans here [http://www.letterpress.dwolske.com/category/free-stuff/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416164053/http:/www.letterpress.dwolske.com/category/free-stuff/ "http://www.letterpress.dwolske.com/category/free-stuff/")  
Don
